title: Type Aid
content:
Submitted by [JamesKing](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009143228/http:/typophile.com/user/18613 "View user profile.") : 15.May.2007 3.04pm 

The St Bride printing library is holding a fundraiser and after party for its 6th annual conference: _Great British Design?_. Everyone is welcome and all money raised will help to keep the library running. Details are below and you can keep informed about the event [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009143228/http:/upcoming.yahoo.com/event/191801/). Please come along and spread the word!

When:  
Friday, June 1, 2007,  
from 6:00 PM

Where:  
St Bride Institute  
Bride Lane, Fleet Street  
London, England EC4Y 8EQ

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009143228im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typeaid_5958.gif)

**Type Aid**

Raising money for St Bride’s – The world’s foremost printing and graphic arts library

Featuring:  
Dave Farey’s typographic pub quiz (starts at 7pm)  
(Team and individual prizes including unlocked Monotype and Linotype CDs)

Visuals by the guest speakers and YOU  
(to display your work email [type.aid@gmail.com](mailto:type.aid@gmail.com) for info)

£6 entry includes 3 free drinks and quiz entry (then drinks for donations)  
Free entry for conference ticket-holders
